channel.title: "Thread-4" ; 317 Client. (Real 317 Deob)
channel.description:
[center][code]Loading 317 cache Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2820 at client.method101(client.java:7705) at client.method96(client.java:7464) at client.method114(client.java:8836) at client.method62(client.java:3013) at client.method7(client.java:2029) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4467) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
When I kill an enemy It's fine but when I die or if I PK somebody I get the following error. Im unsure if it's the dropping of items or not. My source if [b]Devolution v7[/b]. I've changed it alot so I wont post it's client.java. But all of the methods are the same (dropping & dieing).
My client is the issue. Because i tested with the moparscape client and it was fine. Here's the link ; [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,382353.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,382353.0.html[/url] . It loads 317 cache so it's different. Could somebody test out these two and find a solution to this problem please?
I don't want to make a new client. I've made alot of visual changes to the client aswell. So please help me find a solution. I tried making it so the items are deleted but that doesnt work. [b]I noticed that it doesn't even get to the 'un equip' stage of dieing. But it teleports you to the respawn point.[/b]
Please help![/center][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 07:27:04 am[/size][hr][center] I get the following error from the client not the server.[/center]

item.title: "Thread-4" ; 317 Client. (Real 317 Deob)
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

[center]Loading 317 cache Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2820 at client.method101(client.java:7705) at client.method96(client.java:7464) at client.method114(client.java:8836) at client.method62(client.java:3013) at client.method7(client.java:2029) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4467) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

When I kill an enemy It’s fine but when I die or if I PK somebody I get the following error. Im unsure if it’s the dropping of items or not. My source if Devolution v7. I’ve changed it alot so I wont post it’s client.java. But all of the methods are the same (dropping & dieing).

My client is the issue. Because i tested with the moparscape client and it was fine. Here’s the link ; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,382353.0.html . It loads 317 cache so it’s different. Could somebody test out these two and find a solution to this problem please?

I don’t want to make a new client. I’ve made alot of visual changes to the client aswell. So please help me find a solution. I tried making it so the items are deleted but that doesnt work. I noticed that it doesn’t even get to the ‘un equip’ stage of dieing. But it teleports you to the respawn point.

Please help![/center][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 07:27:04 am[/size][hr][center] I get the following error from the client not the server.[/center]
